name: West Bay Pilipino Multi Service Center
description: West Bay Pilipino Multi Service Center is a resource for many recent immigrant families in San Francisco that strives to even the playing field for underserved, vulnerable youth and their families by supplementing existing academic programs with financial, social, emotional, and cultural support. West Bay provides various services for youth and their families, including but not limited to academic support programs for students at all grade levels, young adult services such as Youth Employment an
